Class MultipleChoiceQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • cS356A1.MultipleChoiceQuestion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Question

    public class MultipleChoiceQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
implements Question
    This class creates and instance of a MultipleChoiceQuestion which contains the question, an array or choices as strings, and an array of answers as as strings
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Oscar Nevarez

        Parameters:
        question - the question that will be assigned to this instance.
        choices - the array of choices that will be assigned to this instance
        answer - the array of answers that will be assigned to this instance
